scripts.prebuild: rm -rf ./out && npm install && npm run generate
scripts.docker:buildlocal: npm run build && docker rmi -f zackaryclark/strongman-tracker-api && docker build ./ -t zackaryclark/strongman-tracker-api
scripts.docker:buildrelease: npm run build && docker build ./ -t zackaryclark/strongman-tracker-api:latest -t zackaryclark/strongman-tracker-api:$npm_package_version
scripts.docker:release: npm run docker:buildrelease && npm run docker:pushrelease
scripts.kubelocal:create: kubectl create -f kubernetes/local-deployment.yml && kubectl apply -f kubernetes/local-nodeport.yml
scripts.kubelocal:start: npm run kubelocal:use && npm run docker:buildlocal && npm run kubelocal:create
scripts.kubelocal:stop: npm run kubelocal:use && kubectl delete deployment strongman-tracker-api --ignore-not-found && kubectl delete services strongman-tracker-api --ignore-not-found
scripts.kubeprod:release: kubectl config use-context prod && kubectl rollout restart deployment strongman-tracker-api-deployment
scripts.postversion: npm run git:pushtags && npm run docker:release && sleep 5 && npm run kubeprod:release && npm run print:release
